clinical_study.brief_title: The General Use of Robots in Stroke Recovery: the Anklebot
clinical_study.official_title: The General Use of Robots in Stroke Recovery: the Anklebot

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine if intensive lower extremity robotic therapy can improve gait speed and functional ambulation status in individuals 6 months or greater post-stroke.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in functional ambulation status

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in gait speed
secondary_outcome.description: 6 minute walk test and 10m walk test

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in balance scores

facility.name: Transitions of Long Island Outpatient Rehabilitation
